events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but it still hasn’t arrived. The shipping is really delayed and there's no update on the tracking page.
The reported issue is classified under 'Delivery Delay' due to keywords like 'delay' and 'shipping' in the customer message.
The case has been assigned to delivery support team member John for further assistance regarding the delayed order.
Hello! I’m John from the delivery support team, I’m here to help you with your delayed shipment. Let’s get this sorted out.
Could you please provide your order number so I can check the latest updates on your package and find out the status?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. I really need this item as soon as possible, so I appreciate your help in tracking it.
Thank you for the info. I checked the system and it appears your package was delayed due to a backlog at the shipping center. It should arrive within 3 more days.
I understand the delay, but 3 more days is still very inconvenient. I was hoping for a quicker solution or some kind of compensation.
I have escalated your case to our senior logistics manager to explore options for expediting your delivery or providing compensation.
Your delivery has been prioritized and is now scheduled to arrive by tomorrow. Additionally, we’ve added a 10% discount voucher to your account as an apology.
Just following up to confirm that your order arrived on time and that you are satisfied with the resolution and discount voucher provided.
Since the delivery issue is resolved and the customer confirmed receipt and satisfaction, we are closing this support case now.
A satisfaction survey invitation has been sent to the customer to collect feedback on the handling of their delivery delay issue.
